content.text: Batchee is the name of the bug which Fullbody tried to use to humiliate Sanji by stepping on him and putting him in the soup Sanji had made. The plan did not go the way Fullbody had hoped it would. He is classified as a Type B creature, "Small Friendly".
Batchee is an average bug. In the manga, he is a fly.
In the anime, he is a long brown bug, with two antennae, two little black eyes, ten legs, and two long appendages jutting from his behind.
Nothing is known about Batchee's personality.

He somehow got to the Baratie by hitching a ride on a boat presumably. Fullbody stepped on Batchee and put him inside of his soup in an attempt to humiliate Sanji. Fullbody's plan did not go as planned, and he ended up being the one humiliated.

elements.text: The anime version of Batchee resembles a silverfish (thysanura) if compared with a real insect.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 5 Chapter 43 and Episode 20.
↑  Vivre Card - One Piece Visual Dictionary, Batchee's birthday is given.
↑  One Piece Blue: Grand Data File (p. 48), Batchee's name revealed.
↑  One Piece Blue: Grand Data File (p. 88-89), classification of animals by dangerousness.
